mapper.select: SELECT pc.ContactID AS cid, gr.GroupID, pc.ParticipantID, pc.NodeID, c.Name_First AS first_name, c.Name_Last AS last_name, gr.Name AS type, c.Address, c.City, c.ZipCode AS postalCode, ca.ISO2 AS country, i.Name AS organization, c.Email AS email, c.Phone_Office AS phone, c.URL AS homepage, c.Job_Position AS job_position, c.Job_Description AS description, null AS created_by, null AS created, null AS modified_by, null AS modified FROM gbifims_Node n JOIN gbifims_ContactGrouproleNodeParticipant pc ON (n.ParticipantID = pc.ParticipantID OR n.NodeID = pc.NodeID) JOIN gbifims_Contact c ON pc.ContactID = c.ContactID JOIN gbifims_Grouprole gr ON pc.GrouproleID = gr.GrouproleID JOIN gbifims_Group g ON gr.GroupID = g.GroupID AND gr.GroupID in (11,12,13,31) LEFT JOIN gbifims_Country ca ON c.CountryID_Address = ca.CountryID LEFT JOIN gbifims_Institution i ON c.InstitutionID = i.InstitutionID WHERE pc.Active!=0 AND (c.OnTheWeb is null OR c.OnTheWeb!=0) AND n.ParticipantID = #{imsId} ORDER BY 7,1
